identifier.label: Name / ID (eindeutig)
identifier.description: Unique Identifier of this ressource. If applicable, should use the milesian naming conventions; i.e. Area, Year, Trench...; e.g. for contexts: HU19.A.01 for Context 1 in Trench A in the year 2019 on Humeitepe. (Omit Trench if not applicable.)

dimensionHeadHeight.label: Height of the Head
dimensionHeadHeight.description: Height of the Head from Crown to ???

measuringPointID.label: Measuring-Point-ID
measuringPointID.description: ID of the data in the Totalstation, empty if not applicable

localization.label: Origin of Surveying Data
localization.description: How was the spatial data acquired?

localizationDescription.label: Description of Localization (if Surveying Data are missing)
localizationDescription.description: Either enter a (topographical) description of localization, if only that exists, or record the point numbers or surveying data in the appropriate format.

FotoNr.label: Photograph-ID(s)
FotoNr.description: List the IDs of Fotographs according to the paper form. This can also encompass fotos that are not included in the database itself, but instead archived together with the documentation.

DrawingNr.label: Drawing-ID(s)
DrawingNr.description: List the IDs of drawings according to the paper form. This can also encompass drawings that are not included in the database itself, but instead archived together with the documentation.

quantificationOther.label: Other elements (not on form)
quantificationOther.description: Record other pottery fragments that cannot be entered into the form above - use this carefully and only if absolutely neccessary.

wasFoundIn.label: was found in
wasFoundIn.description: Building, Place or Survey they find came from.

hasFinds.label: Contains Finds
hasFinds.description: Objects that were found within this Building, Place or Survey. Please only use this for the Inventory of finds from older excavations such as the Steindepot-Records!

hasDisturbance.label: Disturbed
hasDisturbance.description: Is the trench/section/context/unit disturbed? (i.e. can some finds be non-indicative?)

contextFindProcessing.label: Requests to Find Processing
contextFindProcessing.description: State the precision with which the contents of the context or unit should be processed. This can be found on the second page of the paper form under the same heading.

sampleTaken.label: Sample taken
sampleTaken.description: 'Yes' if a sample has been collected from the context, e.g. flotation, charcoal, etc.; 'No' if no sample has been taken.

layerClassification.label: Classification of Context
layerClassification.description: Should be identical with the field '' from the paper form. If any terminology is used their often but not present in the database, please let us know.

contextDescription.label: Short Description
contextDescription.description: Corresponds to the field 'short description' on the paper form.

distinguishingCriteria.label: Distinguishing Criteria (in relation to surrounding contexts)
distinguishingCriteria.description: Which criteria have been used to distinguish the context from its surrounding material? (Has to be interpolated from the short Description, there is no corresponding field on the paperform.)

soilType.label: Soiltype
soilType.description: What main type of Soil is it? Elaborate with a thorough description in the text field for 'Colour / Soiltype / Consistency'.

layerSoilContentDesc.label: Colour / Soiltype / Consistency
layerSoilContentDesc.description: Contents of the paper form: Colour / Soiltype / Consistency

layerColor0.label: Soil base colours intensity
layerColor0.description: Select the main colour of the soil together with 'Soil colour intensity'

layerColorIntensity.label: Soil base colour intensity
layerColorIntensity.description: Select intensity of the soils base colour

layerInclusions.label: Material / Inclusions
layerInclusions.description: Select any material that is not a find but present in the soil. Addenda in the text field below.

layerInclusionsDesc.label: Material / Inclusions: Description and Addenda
layerInclusionsDesc.description: Contents of the paper form 'Material / Inclusions'.

layerFinds.label: Finds (overview)
layerFinds.description: An overview of the types of finds present in this context.

layerFindsComplete.label: Complete find collection
layerFindsComplete.description: Have all the finds of this context been handed to find processing (yes) or has only a sample been archives (no). (Present on paper form.)

layerFindsOther.label: Other finds and special finds
layerFindsOther.description: Addenda to 'Finds (overview'). Additionally add the inventory numbers of any special finds associated with this layer. (Additional Finds and Special Finds on the paper form.)

isNatural.label: Natural Occurence
isNatural.description: Is this context a naturally occuring layer ('Yes' for e.g erosion, 'no' if anthropogenous). No corresponding field on the paper form. Can be decided in post-processing.

layerInterpretation.label: Interpretation
layerInterpretation.description: Contents of 'Interpretation' on the paper form. Can be amended in post-processing.

layerDatingIndication.label: Dating Elements
layerDatingIndication.description: Elaborate on the basis of this contexts dating as recorded in the 'Time' tab under 'Period'. (See corresponding field on paper form.)

storagePlaceOther.label: Other Storage Place
storagePlaceOther.description: Please enter place of storage here if it is not an option in the list above.

workflow.label: Workflow
workflow.description: What has already been done with this find?

OldInventoryNr.label: Old Inventorynumber
OldInventoryNr.description: One or many inventory number(s) from old inventory systems.

MuseumInventoryNr.label: Museum of Miletus Inventorynumber
MuseumInventoryNr.description: Inventory-ID at the Museum of Miletus

YearOfFind.label: Year (in case of Altfund)
YearOfFind.description: Year in which the object has been found or first recorded, in case of Altfunde

reused.label: Reused / Reworked / Recarved
reused.description: Has this Statue been reused and / or recarved?

sculptureMaterial.label: Material
sculptureMaterial.description: The material the sculpture mainly consists of.

sculptureMaterialAttr.label: Material: Details
sculptureMaterialAttr.description: The specification of different variants of the scultprues Material.

colour.label: Material: Colour
colour.description: Main colours of the Sculptures material.

materialDescription.label: Material: Description and Addenda
materialDescription.description: More detailed description of the finds material and any addenda, e.g. other materials and their descriptions.

sculptureBodypart.label: Fragment of Sculpture
sculptureBodypart.description: Which parts of the Sculpture are preserved?

sculptureBodypartOther.label: Other type of fragment
sculptureBodypartOther.description: If the type of fragment is not listed, you can enter it here.

sculptureName.label: Honorand
sculptureName.description: If it is known, who is the person depicted in this sculpture?

sculptureType.label: Broad category / Type
sculptureType.description: Type or broad category the sculpture can be assigned to.

sculptureTypeDescription.label: Broad category / Type: Notes and Addenda
sculptureTypeDescription.description: Additional notes regarding the Type of this sculpture.

sculptureClothingDescription.label: Clothing: Addenda
sculptureClothingDescription.description: Additional information or descriptions of the Sculptures Clothing

sculptureHairstyleDescription.label: Hairstyle: Notes
sculptureHairstyleDescription.description: Additional information or descriptions of the Sculptures hair.

sculptureBeardstyleDescription.label: Beardstyle: Notes
sculptureBeardstyleDescription.description: Additional information or descriptions of the Sculptures beard.

sculptureAttributesDescription.label: Attributes: Notes
sculptureAttributesDescription.description: Additional information or descriptions of the Sculptures attributes

sculptureQuality.label: Quality of the worksmanship and sculpture

viewDirection.label: View in direction of ...
viewDirection.description: Direction the Photograph was shot in.

countOilcontainers.label: Oil containers = Lekythoi, Unguentaria etc. (Fragment count)

weightOilcontainers.label: Oil containers = Lekythoi, Unguentaria etc. (Weight in g)

countTools.label: Tools = Lamps, Weights, Beehives etc. (Fragment count)

weightTools.label: Tools = Lamps, Weights, Beehives etc. (Weight in g)

countOilcontainersBase.label: Oil containers = Lekythoi, Unguentaria etc. (Base fragments)

countOilcontainersHandle.label: Oil containers = Lekythoi, Unguentaria etc. (Handle fragments)

infoFromField.label: Assessment of the context by the trench director

fitsOtherContexts.label: Affiliation with other context as assessed by find processing

findSpectrum.label: Composition of form spectrum, quantitative relations
